title: [68Ga]Ga-THP-tetrazine for bioorthogonal click radiolabelling: pretargeted PET imaging of liposomal nanomedicines
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,622-639
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00039K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aishwarya Mishra, Amaia Carrascal-Miniño, Jana Kim, Rafael T. M. de Rosales
A new radiotracer [68Ga]Ga-THP-tetrazine for bioorthogonal click radiochemistry is presented. Its ability for pretargeted imaging of long-circulating liposomal nanomedicines was tested in vitro and in vivo in both healthy and tumour murine models.
